title: Can you help me track down what machines my Pro license is activated on?
labels: Serial Exceeds Maximum Number Of Activations

sections.title: Symptoms
content:
• I am an Educational license holder with many machines activated in Unity
  • I am part of a company with many licenses
  • I would like to know which machines my license is activated on

sections.title: Cause
content: If machines are being constantly re-imaged, such as in a school environment, it can be hard to keep track of your activations. We recommend that you keep your own records, but we can create a list of your activations for you if needed.

sections.title: Resolution
content: Please contact us here with your serial number(s) and we can create a list of your activations for your records. We can also return activations on specific machines, if needed.
